author: rekovic
body:
#### PR description:
New package ```DataFormats/L1TCorrelator``` for Phase2 L1Trigger.

These classes are intended to hold L1T objects reconstructed by matching (correlating) L1TTTracks to objects reconstructed in Muon, Calorimeter, or TrackTrigger of the Phase2 L1 Trigger system.   In the hardware, this will be done in the back-end boards of Phase2 L1T:
- GMT
- GCT
- GTT 
as described in the Phase2 L1 TDR.
title: New package DataFormats/L1TCorrelator for Phase2 L1Trigger
